title: Enhancing Medical Practical Competencies: Abdominal Drainage Procedure Training Course Based on Gagné's Nine-Stage Model

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the indications and contraindications of peritoneal drainage with 80% accuracy.
Learners can derive at least three learning elements required for designing an instructional scenario applying Gagné’s nine-step model.
Learners can complete the step-by-step procedure for performing peritoneal drainage via virtual simulation with an error rate below 15%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
